channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s public claims that DOGE is ‘headed by Elon Musk’ are coming back to haunt him as his administration tries to claim Tesla boss is merely an adviser
item.description: “Trump’s words were essential, central and indispensable,” said Norm Eisen, a lawyer for USAID employees. “His admissions took what would have been a ...

item.title: Mercedes-Benz CEO pushes for zero tariffs as Trump embarks on EU auto trade war
item.description: Mercedes urges the EU and U.S. to abolish car tariffs as Trump threatens new duties, warning that trade barriers could stifle growth.

item.title: Newly released JFK assassination records show details of covert CIA operations in Cuba but ‘nothing points to a second gunman’
item.description: Historians are hoping for details fleshing out Lee Harvey Oswald's activities before the assassination and what the CIA and FBI knew about him beforeh...

item.title: Spring has sprung! And some retailers are offering discounts and freebies to celebrate
item.description: Warning: None will help with your beach bod.

item.title: ‘Never check a bag, ever,’ says Booking CEO Glenn Fogel
item.description: Also: Fed keeps rates steady, Europe could fine Google 10% of its revenues.

item.title: Trump calls for Fed to cut rates as economic effects of tariffs start to kick in
The U.S. hits a new low in global happiness. Eating alone could be the culprit.
Stocks see best ‘Fed day’ rally since July, thanks to a ‘nonchalant’ Powell
Fed sees higher inflation, slower economy due to uncertainty tied to tariffs
Americans get a bigger tax break for buying an EV than for raising kids. Why?
